trans-unit.source: A factory class for creating <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> objects from Windows NT aliases, email addresses, and security identifiers (SIDs).
trans-unit.target: Uma classe do alocador para criar objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> de aliases do Windows NT, endereços de email e SIDs (identificadores de segurança).

trans-unit.source: All methods in <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory> are static and no instance needs to be created.
trans-unit.target: Todos os métodos no <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory> são estáticos e nenhuma instância deve ser criada.

trans-unit.source: The constructor is hidden.
trans-unit.target: O construtor está oculto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration" /> object that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration" /> associado à <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration" /> object associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration" /> objeto associado a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration> object is used for changing the standard Active Directory schema properties that the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> class uses.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration> objeto é usado para alterar as propriedades de esquema padrão do Active Directory que o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> classe usa.

trans-unit.source: The alias string to create the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres do alias para criar o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> using the specified Windows NT alias.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> usando o alias do Windows NT especificado.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that describes the specified Windows NT alias.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> que descreve o alias do Windows NT especificado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> abstract class that is used to access Active Directory functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> é uma implementação concreta do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> classe abstrata que é usada para acessar a funcionalidade do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o repositório do Active Directory é usado para armazenar informações organizacionais para a equipe.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: O objetivo principal para o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> é para fazer consultas em tais informações organizacionais, por motivos comerciais.

trans-unit.source: The email address string from which to create the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres de endereço de email da qual criar o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> using an email address.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> usando um endereço de email.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that describes the specified email address.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> que descreve o endereço de email especificado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> abstract class that is used to access Active Directory functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> é uma implementação concreta do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> classe abstrata que é usada para acessar a funcionalidade do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o repositório do Active Directory é usado para armazenar informações organizacionais para a equipe.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: O objetivo principal para o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> é para fazer consultas em tais informações organizacionais, por motivos comerciais.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> to use to create the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> a ser usado para criar a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> using a Windows NT <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> usando um <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> do Windows NT.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that describes the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> que descreve o <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> abstract class that is used to access Active Directory functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> é uma implementação concreta do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> classe abstrata que é usada para acessar a funcionalidade do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o repositório do Active Directory é usado para armazenar informações organizacionais para a equipe.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: O objetivo principal para o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> é para fazer consultas em tais informações organizacionais, por motivos comerciais.
